description: This file is a frontend React component (using Remix.js framework) for a notes application. It defines a loader function to fetch notes based on query parameters and a default React component to render the notes list interface, including search and filtering controls.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Fetches user session, retrieves notes based on search and tag query parameters, and returns data as JSON.

methods.name: AppIndex
methods.description: Main React component displaying the list of notes, with search, filter, and navigation features.

calls: json({ notes, search: search ?? "", tag: tag ?? "" })
